title: When will Championship Riven be buyable?
body:
As the title.
When will Championship Riven be buyable? S6?

replies.body:
Worlds didn't they say? Thought i read that somewhere. So in like 2 weeks.

They are going to have a Championship Bundle. So Thresh, Shyvanna, Kalista, the changed Riven and the new Zed skin.

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2016/08/red-post-collection-ask-riot-on-champ.html#1
